SELECT A.USER_ID ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.CREATE_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CREATE_DT ,A.USER_PASSWORD ,NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MAX(B.LOGIN_DATE), 'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD'), '접속이력 없음') AS LOGIN_DATE ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_OLAP_USR WHERE USER_ROLE = 'ROLE_USER' AND ENABLED = '1') AS USR_COUNT ,A.RESET_PW FROM TB_OLAP_USR A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_USR_LOG_HIST B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
AND A.USER_ROLE = 'ROLE_USER' AND A.ENABLED = '1' AND UPPER(A.USER_ID) LIKE '%'|| UPPER(#{userId}) ||'%'
GROUP BY A.USER_ID, A.CREATE_DT, A.USER_PASSWORD, A.RESET_PW
